amendment.description: An amendment numbered 57 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funding for United Nations entities unless specifically appropriated in the underlying bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spartz amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 242 (Roll no. 484).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Spartz amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 242 (Roll no. 484).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
